name: Petris (itch)
description:
Petris is a clone of the classic block-puzzle game, with an added extra dimension: pentominoes!

Pentominoes are like the tetromino shapes from regular Tetris, except they're made up of 5 squares instead of 4.

Enjoy the brain-shaking gameplay you know and love, but with a whole new depth! You can even choose to play the game with tetrominoes by going to the options menu.

  • Developed in Unity 2019.2.17
  • Graphics created in Photoshop
  • Music: 'Synthwave E' by TechnoAxe (Royalty Free music licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution)
  • Sound effects created with BFXR

Support me by following my Instagram: @el.niblet
